amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the definition of a "major rule", which triggers the requirement for a Regulatory Impact Analysis, to a rule likely to result in an economic impact of at least $100 million annually, rather than the $50 million threshold provided in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the definition of a "major rule"--triggering the requirement of a Regulatory Impact Analysis--to a rule likely to result in an economic impact of at least $100 million annually. (The bill calls for a threshhold of $50 million annually.)

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 266 (Roll no. 185).
